name: Blademaster
flavor: You have studied bladed weapons like none other. Compared to the other weapons, blades provide a balanced approach. A Blademaster has trained to deal exceptional damage to unarmed foes and defeat larger one through ever-increasing Bleed. They also benefit from increased mobility and defensive options that allow them to destroy a reckless foes' weapon. A Blademaster can switch between offense and defense in an instant, allowing them to find an advantage anywhere.

stances.name: Axebreaker Style
stances.desc: You make use of the nimbleness of a blade to thwart slower weapons with ease.
stances.accumulate: Gain 2 _Momentum_ at Refresh if you are Wielding a _Blade_ Weapon.
stances.effect: Reduce the Attack Roll of all Attacks with _Blunt_ Weapons that target you by 1 as long as you are Wielding a _Blade_ Weapon.
stances.special: You may use the Counter Reaction for no Cost when attacked with a _Blunt_ Weapon as long as you are Wielding a _Blade_ Weapon.

stances.name: Bloodletter Style
stances.desc: You fight a war of attrition, focusing more on inflicting wounds that dealing damage.
stances.accumulate: Gain _Momentum_ equal to a Target's topmost _Bleed_ Token when you _Hit_/_Crit_ with an Attack using a Blade.
stances.effect: Whenever you _Hit_/_Crit_ with an Attack using a Blade Weapon, increase the Target's top Bleed Token by 1. If the _Bleed_ Token is already 3, inflict _Wound_ 1 (1 _Grit_) instead.

stances.name: Guarded Edge Style
stances.desc: You keep your blade on the defensive, darting in and out whenever .
stances.accumulate: Gain 1 _Momentum_ at Refresh if you are Wielding a _Blade_ Weapon.
stances.effect: Whenever you use a _Block_/_Evade_ Reaction you may pay 1 _Momentum_ to deal Damage to the triggering Creature as if you rolled a 5 with your Blade Weapon, so long as they are within your Weapon's Range.

techniques.name: Warding Strike
techniques.desc: A strike that deals less damage, but easily allows you to slip into a defensive stance.
techniques.effect: Attack using your weapon's Profile. Reduce the Damage by 2. Gain 1 _Grit_/_Reflex_.
techniques.imbue: 0 _Momentum_: If the Weapon is _Light_/_Versatile_, Speed is instead Weapon-1 and Move is Step. _Versatile_ Weapons take a -2 damage penalty.

techniques.name: Lacerating Strike
techniques.desc: You go for a quick strike that leaves a vicious wound that, while not immediately lethal, will bleed heavily.
techniques.reqs: Light or Versatile Blade Weapon Wielded.
techniques.effect: Attack using your weapon's Profile. Reduce the Damage by X, with a max of 3. Inflict _Bleed_ 1xX (X _Grit_ negates).
techniques.boost: 1 _Momentum_: Increase the Cost to Negate by 1, and inflict _Wounded_ 1 as well.

techniques.name: Flurry of Steel
techniques.desc: You unleash a rapid series of sword attacks in the blink of an eye.
techniques.effect: Attack using your weapon's Profile three times against the same Target.

techniques.name: Passing Blade
techniques.desc: You quickly strike with your blade while passing by a foe.
techniques.effect: Use one of the Moves provided by this Technique. Attack using your Weapon's Profile. Use the other Move.
techniques.special: If you _Hit_/_Crit_,  add _Safe_ to the second Move.

techniques.name: Vorpal Strike
techniques.desc: You go for a vicious strike that is almost certainly lethal for unarmored foes.
techniques.effect: Attack using your weapon's Profile. Treat the Target's _Guard_ as twice its current value for this attack. If the Target has no _Guard_ or you target a Creature Part, deal 4 additional Damage.

techniques.name: Blade Lock
techniques.desc: You lock your blade with an enemy, forcing them to give you their full attention.
techniques.effect: Unless the Target pays any 2 of _Reflex_/_Focus_ you enter a Blade Lock with them. Choose one of the creature's Wielded Weapons to enter a Blade Lock with, as well as a Blade Weapon you have Wielded. The first creature to either use the Weapon involved in the Blade Lock or willingly Move out of Melee Range loses the Blade Lock. The victor may immediately make a Basic Strike against them at Advantage as a Reaction. On a _Hit_/_Crit_,  inflict _Impair_ 1 (1 _Grit_).
techniques.special: If the creature is unwillingly moved, you may pay 1 _Momentum_ to make a Basic Strike as a Reaction.

techniques.name: Sunder
techniques.desc: You lash out at a foe's weapon, attempting to render it useless.
techniques.effect: Attack using your weapon's Profile, targeting a Wielded Weapon.

techniques.name: Blinding Flourish
techniques.desc: You draw blood and, with an elegant flourish, use it to blind a foe.
techniques.reqs: Must be attached to a Weapon Strike made while Wielding a Blade Weapon.
techniques.effect: If you inflict _Bleed_ with the Attached Strike you may inflict _Blind_ on a creature within Range until the end of their next turn. The Cost to Negate is (X _Reflex_), where X is equal to the total value of _Bleed_ inflicted.

techniques.name: Slashing Counter
techniques.desc: You meet a foes' blade in a dangerous counter, putting both weapons are risk.
techniques.trigger: You are Attacked with a Weapon.
techniques.effect: Attack using your weapon's Profile, targeting the Weapon used for the Attack. If the Target's weapon is _Damaged_, reduce their initial Attack Roll against you by 2. If you _Miss_,  also resolve the Target's Attack against your Weapon. Otherwise, reduce the Attack Roll by 1.

name: Lancer
flavor: You are an expert with long weapons, creating a dangerous field around yourself. A Lancer specializes in controlling an area of the battlefield. Anywhere within the reach of their spear is deadly to foes, and the consistent Hobbled that a Lancer can create guarantees that they will not soon leave that area. An adept Lancer will find a valuable choke-point on the battlefield and control it entirely, making the area impassable to foes.

stances.name: Porcupine Style
stances.desc: Your lance whips around as a thorny spine, punching any who get too close.
stances.accumulate: Gain 1 _Momentum_ every time you deal Damage with a Lance Weapon as a Reaction.
stances.effect: The first time each Turn a creature enters your Reach while your Wielding a Lance Weapon you may pay 1 _Reflex_/_Momentum_ to deal Damage to them as a Reaction as if you rolled a 4 with the Wielded Lance Weapon.

stances.name: Skewer Style
stances.desc: You make mighty strikes with your lance.
stances.accumulate: Gain 1 _Momentum_ every time you _Hit_ with an _Attack_ using a Lance Weapon.
stances.effect: Once per round, when making an _Attack_ with a Lance Weapon that has a Range of Weapon, you may take _Disadvantage_ on the Attack. If you do, instead resolve the Attack in a Line X, where X is the _Reach_ of your Weapon.

stances.name: Swordbreaker Style
stances.desc: You make use of the range of your lance to easily keep blades away.
stances.accumulate: Gain 2 _Momentum_ at Refresh if you are Wielding a _Lance_ Weapon.
stances.effect: Reduce the Attack Roll of all Attacks with _Blade_ Weapons that target you by 1 as long as you are Wielding a _Lance_ Weapon.
stances.special: You may use the Counter Reaction for no Cost when attacked with a _Blade_ Weapon as long as you are Wielding a _Lance_ Weapon.

techniques.name: Retreating Thrust
techniques.desc: You quickly strike with your spear, sliding away as a part of the attack.
techniques.trigger: A creature enters a space within your Lance Weapon's _Reach_.
techniques.effect: Attack using your weapon's Profile. You may _Move_ 1 away from the Target after resolving the Attack.

techniques.name: Lunging Strike
techniques.desc: You lunge with your weapon, extending your reach.
techniques.effect: Attack using your weapon's Profile. Increase the _Reach_ of the Weapon by 1 for this Turn.
techniques.special: You may _Improvise_ this Action as if it had _Fluid_ 2. Gain 1 _Exposed_ if you do so.

techniques.name: Impaling Strike
techniques.desc: You catch a foe on your spear, limiting their movement to a terrifying extent.
techniques.effect: Attack using your weapon's Profile. If the Attack would already inflict _Hobbled_, increase the cost to _Negate_ by 1 and the Value by 1. Otherwise, except on a _Miss_,  inflict _Hobbled_ 1 (2 _Reflex_).

techniques.name: Rapid Thrust
techniques.desc: You quickly attack twice with your lance, forcing a foe to focus on you.
techniques.effect: Attack using your weapon's _Profile_ twice against the same Target. If both Attacks _Hit_,  gain 1 _Momentum_.

techniques.name: Harrying Thrust
techniques.desc: You quickly strike with your spear in an attempt to limit a foe's mobility, only catching them if they continue to advance.
techniques.trigger: A creature enters a space within your Lance Weapon's _Reach_.
techniques.effect: The target gains _Hobbled_ 1 (2 _Reflex_). Instead of applying this to the creature's next Movement it is instead applied to their current Movement, even if that Movement is already affected by _Hobbled_.
techniques.special: The target may _Negate_ the _Hobbled_ for no cost by allowing you to immediately make a _Basic Strike_ against them.

techniques.name: Butt Smack
techniques.desc: You whip the butt of your spear around for a swift, if less damaging, attack.
techniques.effect: Attack using your weapon's Profile. Deal half Damage, and replace all _Hobbled_ with _Exposed_.

techniques.name: Lower Spear
techniques.desc: You ready your weapon for an incoming charge, preparing to punish a foe's momentum.
techniques.effect: Make all spaces in a Side Burst X a Hazard, where X is your Lance Weapon's Reach. All Reactions using your Lance Weapon against a creature in these spaces cost 1 less and deal additional damage equal to half the number of spaces that creature moved this turn. All Reactions using your Lance Weapon cost 1 more against creatures not in these Hazard spaces. These Hazards are removed if you move or are no longer Wielding your Lance.

techniques.name: Set Spear
techniques.desc: You prepare yourself for an attack, situating your lance in the ideal space for a strike.
techniques.effect: Until you make an Attack with your Lance Weapon this _Round_, increase your Lance Weapon's _Reach_ by 1 and gain _Advantage_ on your next Attack with it.

techniques.name: Driving Flourish
techniques.desc: You push a foe back at spearpoint, giving you space to make use of your exceptional reach.
techniques.reqs: Must be attached to a Weapon Strike made while Wielding a Lance Weapon.
techniques.effect: On a _Graze_ with the Attached Strike, add _Push_ 2 (1 _Grit_) to the Attack. On a _Hit_,  add _Push_ 3 (2 _Grit_). On a _Crit_,  add _Push_ 4 (3 _Grit_).
techniques.special: A foe may choose to instead take Damage equal to the _Push_ value to instead not be _Pushed_. If a creature cannot be _Push_ed, either due to an ability or an Obstacle, they must take this Damage. This Damage is added to the total damage done by the initial attack.

name: Martial Artist
flavor: A Martial Artist's body itself is the weapon, preventing you from ever being disarmed. This Discipline allows for extremely flexible, dynamic combat that can choose from a host of different Weapons instantly. While they deal low damage, Martial Artists can easily inflict a wide-range of status effects, and can make an unparalleled number of attacks with ease. They are particularly adept at manipulating Tokens, whether that be gaining additional Momentum and Defensive Tokens for themselves or depriving foes of those same abilities.

stances.name: Living Weapon Style
stances.desc: Your entire body is a weapon, with every part of you capable of killing with ease.
stances.accumulate: Gain 1 _Momentum_ for every Attack you make with a different Unarmed Weapon in a Round.
stances.special: When you learn this Stance, gain a single Weapon with the _Martial_ Keyword.

stances.name: Open Hand Style
stances.desc: Your hands are deadly weapons, removing any advantage a foe has with each strike.
stances.accumulate: Gain +1 _Momentum_ for each subsequent _Hit_/_Crit_ against the same Target with a _Fist_ Weapon in the same _Round_.
stances.effect: Gain a +1 bonus to Attacks with _Fist_ Weapons. Reduce the _Cost_ of _Block_/_Evade_ Reactions by 1 against creatures with _Impaired_, _Dazed_, or _Exposed_ while you have an _Open Hand_.
stances.special: When you learn this Stance, gain a single Weapon with the _Martial_ and _Fist_ Keywords.

stances.name: Rising Leg Style
stances.desc: Your legs move like a flash, taking your foes to the ground in an instance.
stances.accumulate: Gain 1 _Momentum_ every time you knock a foe _Prone_ using a _Kick_ Weapon.
stances.effect: Gain a +1 bonus to Attacks with _Kick_ Weapons. Whenever you inflict _Hobbled_ with a _Kick_ Weapon on a creature that is already _Hobbled_ you may choose to instead inflict _Prone_.
stances.special: When you learn this Stance, gain a single Weapon with the _Martial_ Keyword.

techniques.name: Adaptive Strike
techniques.desc: You go in for a quick series of unarmed strikes against a foe.
techniques.effect: Attack using your weapon's _Profile_. After resolving the Attack, use the Form Change Maneuver.

techniques.name: Recovering Strike
techniques.desc: You make use of an unarmed strike to recompose yourself and remove debilitating conditions.
techniques.effect: Immediately before your Turn, gain any 2 _Defensive Tokens_. You may immediately spend these as if it was the end of your _Turn_ to clear any kind of _Condition_. Any remaining _Defensive Token_s gained from this ability that are not spent are lost. Attack using your weapon's _Profile_.

techniques.name: Pressure Point
techniques.desc: You make a precise, focused strike that interrupts a creature's bond with their spirit.
techniques.effect: Attack using your weapon's _Profile_. Inflict _Suppressed_ 1 (2 _Focus_) on a _Hit_/_Suppressed_ 2 (3 _Focus_) on a _Crit_.

techniques.name: Stunning Strike
techniques.desc: You make a heavy, powerful strike that knocks a foe off-balance.
techniques.effect: Attack using your weapon's _Profile_. Inflict _Staggered_ (2 _Focus_) on a _Hit_/_Staggered_, _Staggered_ (3 _Focus_) on a _Crit_.

techniques.name: Flurry of Blows
techniques.desc: You go in for a quick series of unarmed strikes against a foe.
techniques.effect: Make two Attacks against the same Target using any valid Weapons, at least one of which must be _Light_.

techniques.name: Reaper
techniques.desc: You are a mass of fists and kicks, whirling across the battlefield in a frenzy.
techniques.effect: Make three Attacks using Unarmed Weapons.
techniques.special: Anytime you Defeat an enemy you gain another Reposition Move. All Movement from this Technique is _Safe_ against any creature you Attack.
techniques.boost: 1 _Momentum_: Make 1 more Attack with an Unarmed Weapon. You may repeat this Boost, increasing the Cost by 1 each time.

techniques.name: Redirect
techniques.desc: You quickly strike an attacking foe, redirecting their blow.
techniques.trigger: You are attacked by an adjacent foe while you have an _Open Hand_.
techniques.effect: Make an Attack against the creature with an _Unarmed_ Weapon. Inflict no Status but, on a 7+, change the Target of the Attack to another creature within the Target's Range. The creature may pay the _Negate_ cost to automatically _Miss_ this redirected Attack. On a 6 or lower, resolve this Reaction as Dodge if you paid _Reflex_ or Deflect if you paid _Grit_.

techniques.name: Transfer Energy
techniques.desc: You ensure every advantage you gain is inflicted in inverse upon your foe.
techniques.trigger: You would gain _Momentum_ or a _Defensive Token_ from an Unarmed Attack due to its _Profile_.
techniques.effect: Replace gaining the Token with _Drain_ with the same Token and amount. The cost to _Negate_ is _Focus_ equal to the Tokens being _Drain_ed plus 1.

techniques.name: Flawless Technique
techniques.desc: You easily make an unarmed strike without sacrificing your momentum in battle.
techniques.effect: Attack using your weapon's _Profile_.

name: Sharpshooter
flavor: You reign down damage from afar, making use of a powerful long-ranged weapon with ease. The Artillery style requires carefully managing your range and turn order in order to set up powerful single-target damage. In addition, masters of Artillery techniques can easily create wide zones on the battlefield and punish foes harshly for daring to enter these areas without caution.

stances.name: Close-Quarters Style
stances.desc: You have become adept at using your bow in close-quarters and can rapidly fire without issue.
stances.accumulate: Whenever you make an Attack against a creature within 5 spaces gain 1 _Momentum_ and deal an additional 1 Damage.
stances.effect: Decrease the _Artillery_ property of all your Ranged Weapons by 2.

stances.name: Overwatch Style
stances.desc: You excel at taking prepared shots at foes, slipping past their defenses when they least expect it.
stances.accumulate: Whenever you _Hit_ with a Reaction Attack using a Ranged Weapon, gain 1 _Momentum_. If you _Crit_, instead gain 2 _Momentum_.
stances.effect: Gain a +1 bonus to all Ranged Attacks made not on your Turn. At Refresh, you may pay 2 _Momentum_ to create a Blast 1 Hazard within Weapon Range. Once per Phase, you may make a single Attack at _Disadvantage_ against a creature in that Area so long as they are within your Weapon Range. You may not attack the same Creature more than once per Round.

stances.name: Sniper Style
stances.desc: You focus your aim, finding the weak points in your foe's defenses and exploiting them for devastating damage.
stances.accumulate: Once per Turn, whenever you defeat a foe with an attack with a Ranged Weapon gain 2 _Momentum_. If that foe was previously undamaged, instead gain 3 _Momentum_.
stances.effect: Whenever you make a Strike with a Ranged Weapon, you may choose to take no Movement. If you do, increase your Attack Roll by 1 and increase the Range by 2.

techniques.name: Barrage
techniques.desc: You either load additional ammunition or rapidly fire, unleashing a barrage of attacks against a creature.
techniques.effect: Make three Attacks using your Weapon's Profile against the same Target. Each Attack deals half Damage.

techniques.name: Pinning Shot
techniques.desc: You pin a creature to an adjacent surface, limiting their mobility.
techniques.reqs: Ranged or Thrown Weapon Wielded that deals _Pierce_ Damage.
techniques.effect: Attack using your Weapon's Profile. If the Target is adjacent to an Obstacle, inflict _Pinned_ (2 _Reflex_).
techniques.boost: 2 _Momentum_: Instead, inflict _Pinned_ (2 _Reflex_) regardless of if the creature is adjacent to an Obstacle.

techniques.name: Spacing Strike
techniques.desc: You make an impromptu melee strike with your weapon to create space before following it up with a sudden shot.
techniques.reqs: Ranged Weapon without the Thrown Property Wielded.
techniques.effect: Make an Attack with a Light Improvised Weapon if your Ranged Weapon is _Light_, Medium Improvised Weapon if _Versatile_, or Heavy Improvised Weapon if _Heavy_. Add _Push_ 1 (1 _Grit_) to the Attack. Immediately after, make a Weapon Strike using your Ranged Weapon, but deal half Damage and reduce the Cost to _Negate_ by 1.
techniques.special: If _Improvising_ from a Weapon Technique using a Ranged Weapon, this is instead _Fluid_ 2. Reduce the Cost of this Technique by an amount equal to the Cost of the previous Technique.

techniques.name: Deadeye Shot
techniques.desc: You fire a shot with incredible accuracy, making incredible use of elevation.
techniques.effect: Attack using your Weapon's Profile and gain a +1 bonus to the Attack Roll. If you are at a higher _Elevation_ than the Target, attack with _Advantage_. If you are at least at two higher _Elevation_, also ignore _Cover_.

techniques.name: Overdraw
techniques.desc: You draw your bow back farther or spin your sling faster, preparing for a far more powerful strike.
techniques.reqs: Must be Attached to a Strike with a _Versatile_ or _Heavy_ Ranged Weapon.
techniques.effect: The Attached Strike is not resolved until the end of the current _Phase_. Resolve it as a Line X, where X is the Weapon's Rang. Add _Pierce_ 2 to the Attack.

techniques.name: Steady Aim
techniques.desc: You set your feet, preparing for a steadily aimed shot.
techniques.effect: You gain _Staggered_. If you do not Move (willingly or unwillingly) before making a Strike with a Ranged Weapon gain a +2 bonus to your Attack Roll and gain 2 _Momentum_ on a _Hit_ or _Crit_.

techniques.name: Focused Aim
techniques.desc: You take careful aim, lining up a deadly shot if the target does not take precautions.
techniques.effect: You gain _Staggered_. Pick a creature within Range. If you do not Move before that creature ends its next _Turn_ within your Weapon Range, outside your _Artillery_ Range, and not _Prone_ or in _Cover_ you may make a Weapon Attack against them with _Advantage_.

techniques.name: Suppressing Fire
techniques.desc: You fire missiles out at foes, pinning them down and limiting their mobility.
techniques.effect: Create an Area-sized Hazard within Range. This Hazard persists until your next Turn or the end of the Round. All foes that Attack while in this Hazard take a -2 penalty to Attack Rolls. They may ignore this penalty by allowing you to make an Attack with your Ranged Weapon against them at _Disadvantage_.

techniques.name: Volley
techniques.desc: You fire a high, arcing shot, gaining range and avoiding cover at the expense of a swift strike.
techniques.effect: Create a Size 1 Hazard within Range. At the end of the next Phase make an Attack against a creature within that space that ignores _Cover_ and deals 1 additional Damage.
techniques.imbue: 2 _Momentum_: Instead, create a Blast 1 Hazard or three Size 1 Hazards within Range. Resolve the Effect against all creatures within any of these Hazards, but a single creature may only be attacked once.

name: Thrower
flavor: You fling weapons with uncanny, practiced skill, easily finding purchase against a foe.

stances.name: Called Shot Style
stances.desc: You aim for vital points with your thrown weapons, sacrificing accuracy for increased damage.
stances.accumulate: Whenever you _Crit_ with a _Thrown_ Weapon gain 2 _Momentum_.
stances.effect: You _Crit_ with Thrown Weapon on any roll .
stances.special: _Embed_ (1 _Reflex_) with all Thrown Weapons on a _Hit_, or _Embed_ (2 _Reflex_) on a _Crit_.

stances.name: Barb Style
stances.desc: Your thrown weapons stick with your foes, limiting their movement and ability to strike.
stances.accumulate: Whenever you _Embed_ with a _Thrown_ Weapon gain 1 _Momentum_.
stances.effect: Whenever you _Embed_ you may pay 1 _Momentum_ to inflict _Hobbled_ 1 if the foe does not _Negate_ the _Embed_. If a creature clears this _Embed_, they automatically clear the _Hobbled_.
stances.special: _Embed_ (1 _Reflex_) with all Thrown Weapons on a _Hit_, or _Embed_ (2 _Reflex_) on a _Crit_.

techniques.name: Opportune Throw
techniques.desc: When a foe strikes one of your allies you seize the opportunity, hurling a weapon in their direction.
techniques.trigger: A foe within Range makes an Attack against one of your allies.
techniques.effect: The Target chooses: Either they reduce their Attack Roll by 2 and you make a single Attack at _Disadvantage_ against them, or they resolve their Attack with no penalty and you make a single Attack against them. Your Attack must be made with a Thrown Weapon that you have Wielded.
techniques.boost: 1 _Reflex_: Instead, you may use this Technique with any Thrown Weapon you have Equipped or Wielded. You do not need an Open Hand to use this Attack.

techniques.name: Sudden Throw
techniques.desc: By the time your foe realizes you've thrown a weapon, it's already too late.
techniques.effect: Immediately Attack with a Thrown Weapon that you have Wielded. You do not need an Open Hand to use this Attack. This Attack deals half Damage and the cost to _Negate_ everything except _Embed_ is reduced by 1.
techniques.boost: 1 _Reflex_: Instead, you may use this Technique with any Thrown Weapon you have Equipped or Wielded. You do not need an Open Hand to use this Attack.

techniques.name: Palm Throw
techniques.desc: You draw and fling a weapon with frightening speed, potentially catching a foe off-guard.
techniques.reqs: _Light_ or _Versatile_ Thrown Weapon Wielded or Equipped.
techniques.effect: Immediately Attack with a Thrown Weapon that you have Equipped or Wielded. You do not need an Open Hand to use this Attack. Versatile Weapons take a -2 penalty to Damage.
techniques.special: Gain a +1 to your Attack Roll if the Target has not taken a _Turn_ yet this _Round_.

techniques.name: Barrage
techniques.desc: You rapidly fling thrown weapons out, buffeting a small area.
techniques.effect: Attack using your Weapon's Profile. Immediately make another Attack against a creature adjacent to the original target using the same Weapon, using a different Thrown Weapon you have Wielded or Equipped with the same Speed or less.
techniques.boost: 2 _Momentum_: Make another Attack against a creature adjacent to either target. You may use this Boost multiple times, but may not hit a creature more than once with this Technique.

techniques.name: Bouncing Throw
techniques.desc: You skip your throw off a nearby object, increasing its range and letting it strike at an unexpected angle.
techniques.effect: Attack using your Weapon's Profile. After resolving the Attack, if it does not _Embed_ you may move the Weapon up to its Range - 2 before it falls to the ground. If you move it back to yourself you may catch it in your hand.
techniques.special: You may instead Target an Obstacle with this Attack, in which case you may treat the Obstacle as the origin of this Attack. Reduce the Range of the secondary Attack by 2.
techniques.boost: 2 _Momentum_: You may move the Weapon regardless of whether it _Embeds_ or not. If you move it into another creature you may make an Attack using the Weapon's Profile.

techniques.name: Disabling Throw
techniques.desc: You fling your weapon out, focusing more on limiting a foe than actually harming them.
techniques.effect: Attack using your Weapon's Profile. This Attack deals half Damage, but increase the cost to Negate by 1. In addition, if the attack does not already have _Embed_, add _Embed_ (1 _Reflex_) on a _Hit_ or _Crit_.
techniques.boost: 1 _Reflex_: Instead, you may use this Technique with any Thrown Weapon you have Equipped or Wielded. You do not need an Open Hand to use this Attack.

techniques.name: Distracting Lob
techniques.desc: You toss a weapon high in the air. While it has little force behind it, it does draw the eyes of all foes involved.
techniques.effect: Create a Size 1 _Hazard_ within Range and throw a Wielded Thrown Weapon upwards. Inflict _Exposed_ 1 (2 _Focus_) on all creatures in a _Burst_ 1 around the _Hazard_. At the end of the next Phase remove the _Hazard_ and your Thrown Weapon lands harmlessly in that space.
techniques.boost:
1 _Momentum_: Instead, when you remove the _Hazard_, make an Attack with your Thrown Weapon against any creature in that space. Deal half Damage and reduce the cost to _Negate_ by 1.
1 _Momentum_: Instead, inflict _Exposed_ 2 (3 _Focus_) on a creature within the _Hazard_.

techniques.name: Vicious Draw
techniques.desc: You pull an embedded throwing weapon from a foe before flinging it into another.
techniques.effect: Choose an adjacent creature with a _Thrown_ Weapon _Embedded_. That creature must may 2 _Reflex_ or immediately take 3 _True_ Pierce Damage and end their _Embed_.
techniques.boost: 1 _Momentum_: Immediately make a _Thrown_ Attack with your Weapon's Profile against a different creature.

techniques.name: Catch
techniques.desc: You move deftly, snatching a ranged weapon out of midair.
techniques.reqs: Open Hand or Thrown Weapon Wielded.
techniques.trigger: You are Attacked with a Thrown or Ranged Weapon.
techniques.effect: Make an opposed Attack Roll against the triggering Attack. If you meet or exceed the triggering Attack Roll, you may immediately Wield the triggering Weapon and treat the triggering Attack as a Miss. If you triggered this Technique while Wielding a Thrown Weapon, you may Equip that Thrown Weapon before you Wield the triggering Weapon. If you do not choose to Wield the Weapon, it instead falls in an adjacent space of your choice.
techniques.special: If you Trigger this after being attacked with a Ranged Weapon, instead of Wielding the Thrown Weapon, you instead Wield a Light Improvised Weapon.
techniques.boost: 2 _Momentum_: Immediately make an Attack using the Weapon you just caught.

name: Warrior
flavor: You are well-suited to blunt weapons such as hammers and axes, using their driving force to decimate foes. The Warrior Discipline specializes in consistent Push techniques that allow you to control the positions of foes, powerful Attacks that can  easily destroy obstacles and armor, and attacks that leave foes reeling with Exposed or Dazed. While their attacks tend to be slower, high-damage attacks will devastate foes while leaving openings for allies.

stances.name: Bully Style
stances.desc: Your weapons carry more weight than most, something you can use to great effect.
stances.accumulate: Whenever you _Push_ a foe with your Weapon, gain 1 _Momentum_. Whenever you knock a foe _Prone_ with your Weapon, gain 2 _Momentum_.
stances.effect: Whenever you _Hit_ with a Weapon Strike using a Blunt Weapon you may add _Push_ 1. Whenever you _Crit_,  you may add either _Push_ 2 or knock them _Prone_.
stances.special: Whenever you _Push_ a creature into an Obstacle with a Blunt Weapon they take 2 True Damage.

stances.name: Crusher Style
stances.desc: You specialize in punishing foes in armor, not only shattering their defenses but also crumpling it in a painful way.
stances.effect: Whenever you _Shred_ with a Blunt Weapon also inflict _Wounded_ 1 (1 _Grit_).
stances.special: When you reduce a creature's Armor to 0 you may inflict _Hobbled_ 3 (2 _Grit_).

stances.name: Lancebreaker Style
stances.desc: Your blunt weapon is well-suited for breaking through the feeble defenses of a spear.
stances.accumulate: Gain 2 _Momentum_ at Refresh if you are Wielding a _Blunt_ Weapon.
stances.effect: Reduce the Attack Roll of all Attacks with _Lance_ Weapons that target you by 1 as long as you are Wielding a _Blunt_ Weapon.
stances.special: You may use the Counter Reaction for no Cost when attacked with a _Lance_ Weapon as long as you are Wielding a _Blunt_ Weapon.

techniques.name: Backbreaker
techniques.desc: You slam your weapon into a prone foe, transferring all the force into their body.
techniques.effect: Attack using your weapon's Profile. If the Target is _Prone_ you may treat a roll of 8 or higher as a 12, add _Hobbled_ 2 to the Attack, and increase the Cost to Negate by 1.

techniques.name: Sapping Strike
techniques.desc: Your weapon makes heavy contact, slowly draining your foe's will to fight.
techniques.effect: Attack using your weapon's Profile. On a _Hit_,  you may force the Target to discard 1 Defensive Token. On a _Crit_,  they discard 2. If they do not have sufficient Defensive Tokens, deal additional damage equal to the number of tokens they do not discard.
techniques.boost: 1 _Momentum_: If you _Hit_/_Crit_,  inflict _Wounded_ 1 (2 _Grit_) after the Target discards Tokens.

techniques.name: Concussive Strike
techniques.desc: A strike putting the full weight of your weapon to bear, leaving a foe unable to respond.
techniques.effect: Attack using your weapon's Profile. Increase the Cost to Negate by 1, and inflict _Dazed_ 2 (2 _Focus_) on an 8+.

techniques.name: Clear a Path
techniques.desc: You march across the battlefield, clearing a path with your hammer.
techniques.effect: All Movement granted by this ability must be in a straight line. Every time you move a space, you may use a Basic Strike against a creature directly in front of you, adding _Push_ 1 (2 _Grit_). If the Strike would _Push_, instead _Push_ that creature to your left or right instead of directly away from you. If you are unable to keep moving because a creature was not Pushed, end this attack.

techniques.name: Helm Splitter
techniques.desc: A mighty overhand blow that thwarts armor and attempts to block.
techniques.effect: Attack using your weapon's Profile and increase the Damage by 2.

techniques.name: Destructive Backswing
techniques.desc: You don't waste your weapon's momentum and instead use it to press your advantage.
techniques.trigger: You _Miss_/_Graze_ with an Attack using a Blunt Weapon.
techniques.effect: Choose one: Move 1, repeat the Attack against an Obstacle in Range, or inflict _Vulnerable_ 1 (1 _Reflex_) on the original Target of the Attack.

techniques.name: Mighty Swing
techniques.desc: You smash through the terrain with your weapon, creating an opening for yourself.
techniques.effect: Attack an Obstacle using your weapon's Profile. If you destroy it, deal 2 Damage and inflict _Vulnerable_ 2 (1 _Reflex_) on a creature adjacent to the Obstacle. You may also Move 1 into the Obstacle's space, separate from your current Movement.
techniques.boost: 1 _Momentum_: Instead, inflict _Exposed_ 2 and increase the cost to Negate by 1.
techniques.imbue: 1 _Momentum_: Speed is instead Set-Up and the Cost to Negate is increased by 1.

techniques.name: Bash Aside
techniques.desc: You focus an attack on a foe's defenses, doing little damage but knocking them off-balance.
techniques.effect:
You may purchase a number of the following effects equal to the Speed of your Weapon and inflict them on a creature within Range. You may purchase the same effect multiple times:
	• 1: Inflict _Exposed_ 1 or _Vulnerable_ 2.
	• 2: Inflict _Staggered_, _Exposed_ 2 _Vulnerable_ 3, or _Dazed_ 1.
	• 3: Inflict _Exposed_ 3 or _Dazed_ 2.
	• 4: Inflict _Dazed_ 3.
The total Cost to Negate is Grit or Focus equal to your Weapon's Speed.

techniques.name: Shattering Flourish
techniques.desc: You tear your weapon away with brutal force, destroying armor and creating an opening.
techniques.reqs: Must be attached to a Weapon Strike made while only Wielding a Blunt Weapon.
techniques.effect: Immediately make a Basic Strike against the creature's Armor using the same Weapon used for the Attached Strike. Deal no Damage to the Creature and inflict no Conditions.
techniques.special: If the Target of the Attached Strike used a _Block_ Reaction against the Attached Strike, you may instead choose Target a piece of Equipment they have Wielded. This attack does not have Disadvantage.
